O jogo é sensacional, não é atoa a sua popularidade.

CS just ain't what it used to be. At least on NA, every single game has at least one blatant cheater, and at least two other sus players. Valve have abandoned VAC, and prime matchmaking never fixed anything in the first place, so it's LITERALLY impossible to rank up.
Мне нравиться, но если без багов то будет вообще зашибок
